name: Hot Turkey Breakfast Sausage

instructions.en: Blend the turkey and spices well in a mixing bowl.
instructions.sk: V miske dobre zmiešajte morku a korenie.
instructions.ja: ボウルで七面鳥のひき肉とスパイスをよく混ぜ合わせます。

instructions.en: Either shape into patties or leave as bulk sausage.
instructions.sk: Buď vytvarujte na fašírky alebo nechajte ako voľné mäso.
instructions.ja: パティ状に成形するか、そのままのひき肉の状態で調理します。

instructions.en: Fry in a pan until cooked through, about 5 minutes per side for patties or 10 minutes for bulk sausage.
instructions.sk: Smažte na panvici, kým nie je mäso prepečené, asi 5 minút z každej strany pre fašírky alebo 10 minút pre voľné mäso.
instructions.ja: フライパンで完全に火が通るまで調理します。パティの場合は片面5分程度、ひき肉の状態なら10分程度です。

notes: Makes 4-6 servings. Can be frozen. For milder sausage, omit or reduce the amount of cayenne. If chicken seasoning is unavailable, use 1/2 teaspoon poultry seasoning and 1/2 teaspoon salt instead.
